title: Soccer stats actor Input Schema
description: This is the input schema to use this actor.

type.title: type
type.description: Defines the information that will be scraped

leagues.title: leagues
leagues.description: Array of leagues that will be scraped

season.title: season
season.description: Selects current season or the last season

selectedWeeks.title: selectedWeeks
selectedWeeks.description: Selects the starting week and the ending week if you are scraping the type: 'SELECTEDWEEKS'

useProxy.title: useProxy
useProxy.description: Selects if you want to use a proxy
